fulltext:
PHAN KIẾN THỨC 
SENIOR DATA ENGINEER 
4 years’ practical experience on Data 
Email: kienthuc.phan@gmail.com 
Phone: (+84) 932 870 505 
Address: no. 112, 47 street, District 07, HCMC 
EDUCATION 
University of Science, Vietnam National University Ho Chi Minh City 
B.S., Knowledge Engineering, September 2015 
GPA: 7.6/10 
Thesis: Building an Intrusion Detection System for Database 
EXPERIENCE 
Sendo Joint Stock Company (Jul 2019 - Present) 
Sendo Joint Stock Company is a Vietnamese e-commerce retailer and online commerce 
platform 
Data engineer (Jul 2019 - Present) 
Building Data Framework (Jul 2019 - Present) 
Objective: Build a framework that users (BI and RaD) do not need to understand the 
internal architecture that can mining and exploit data. 
Task: 
-
Building data lake, streaming log-based change capture data (SQL Server, Mongo, 
MySQL) 
-
Building online analytical processing (OLAP) 
-
Supported by high-level business intelligence and analytics data exploration and 
visualization tools 
Technical: Kafka, Hadoop, Airflow, Spark, SQL Server, Mongo, MySQL, Druid, Metabase 
VNG Corporation (Jan 2015 – Jul 2019) 
VNG Corporation (VNG) is a Vietnamese technology company, founded in 2004, 
specializing in digital content and online entertainment, social networking, and e- 
commerce. The company has about 100 million online users 
Senior Data engineer ( Apr 2019 – Jul 2019) 
Migrate data warehouse(Jan 2019 – Jul 2019) 
Objective: Replace old technology with new technology, support streaming data. 
Task: 
-
Preliminary discussion and assessment of current status 
-
Migrate oozie job to airflow job, pig job to spark job 
-
Understand business and support BI, marketing ad-hoc task 
-
R&D Kafka Streaming 
Technical: Spark, Hadoop, Airflow, Ozzie, Pig, Hive, CrateDB, PostgresDB, Redis, 
Grafana, Kafka  
Data engineer ( Apr 2017 – Apr 2019) 
Build Masking Sensitive Data System (Oct 2017 - Jan 2019) 
Object: Building data platform, where departments in VNG corp that can share 
valuable data for another that masking sensitive data. 
Task: 
-
Create data pipeline architecture 
-
Build the metadata for schedule task management 
-
Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual 
processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater 
scalability, etc 
-
Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of 
data from a wide variety of data sources using Spark and Hadoop ecosystem. 
-
Reviewed  log  trading  audit  trails  and  effectively explained any missing data to 
ensure all required elements were captured 
-
Send email alert for new issues 
-
Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional 
business requirements 
-
Loaded the aggregate data into a relational database/API for reporting, 
dash boarding and Ad-hoc analyses 
-
Reviews all data fields for accuracy with customer requirement 
-
Identify and resolve data issues 
Technical: Spark, Hadoop, Airflow, Hive, PostgresDB, Redis 
Build Farmer & Fraud Detection System (Oct 2018 - Present) 
Object: detect farming promotion zalopay, fraud detection zalopay 
Task: 
-
Supported maintained code, improve performance 
-
Perform parameters tuning for machine learning model 
-
Supported deploy data visualization and reporting daily 
-
Deploy RESTful API using Docker 
Fraud Detection (Apr 2017 – Oct 2018) 
Object: R&D fraud detection zalopay 
Task: 
-
Extract information and analyze transactions and active user logs 
-
Design and Implementation of a Fraud Detection API 
Security engineer (Jan 2015 – Apr 2017) 
Anomaly-based intrusion detection system (Jan 2015 - Apr 2017) 
Object: R&D anomaly detection in system log for security 
Task: 
-
Research Machine Learning technology for Anomaly Detection. 
-
Analyze security events (for example: server logs, firewall logs, …), visualize 
and classify data to detect outliers (for example: attacking, fraudulent 
behavior, compromised servers, malware traffic, ...) 
-
Build predictive models to detect abnormal events automatically 
-
Build dashboard monitor logs 
SKILLS: 
Programming language: Python, Scala, R, Bash 
Platform: GNU/Linux 
Database: PostgreSQL, Redis, Hive, MongoDB, CrateDB, MySQL 
Framework and libraries: Apache Spark, Apache Hadoop, Apache Airflow, Apache 
Kafka, Apache Oozie, Nginx, Gunicorn, Flask, Numpy, TensorFlow, Matplotlib 
Tools: Docker, Maven 
HOBBIES: Travel, Music, Running
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)

educations.school: University of Science, Vietnam National University Ho Chi Minh City
